description: Number of intersection points of diagonals of n-gon, plus number of vertices.
comments: If Y is a 3-subset of an n-set X then, for n>=4, a(n-3) is the number of 4-subsets of X which have neither one element nor two elements in common with Y. Y is a 3-subset of an n-set X then, for n>=4, a(n-3) is the number of (n-4)-subsets of X which have neither one element nor two elements in common with Y.lso, if - _Milan Janjic_, Dec 28 2007
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_
